headline: Nuclear renaissance has 'more momentum' than ever to power AI
summary: Nuclear energy is poised to be the biggest contributor to powering the AI revolution. ClearView Energy Partners, LLC managing director Timothy Fox comes on Market Catalysts to discuss the relationship between small modular reactor (SMR) developers with major hyperscalers as Big Tech leans heavier into the nuclear space. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Fed meeting ahead: 4 investment plays to benefit from rate cuts
summary: Investors largely expect the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates at the FOMC meeting next week on Wednesday, Sept. 17. Powers Advisory Group managing partner Matt Powers joins Market Catalysts to share his investment strategy ahead of the Fed meeting and discuss current market dynamics. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Goldman Sachs Reaffirms ‘Buy’ Rating on NextEra Energy, Inc. (NEE) With $91 PT
summary: NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NEE) is one of the 11 Best Roth IRA Stocks to Invest in Now. On August 28, 2025, Goldman Sachs reaffirmed its ‘Buy’ rating on NextEra Energy, Inc. summary: VST to benefit from strong demand, robust assets, and capital returns, but earnings growth remains uneven.
